"Phew.<br>Just a bit more.": "...Oh? Paying a visit?"
"Grave tending?"
"Visiting family?"

"Yeah. It'll get buried in snow
if it's not taken care of."

"Yeah...
My parents, Grandpa..."
"Well, actually..."
"Nobody has really been buried here."
"Not my Dad, my Mom, or Grandpa..."

"I don't really remember much
about my Mom and Dad."

"When we were all still really young, the disaster
over by Mt. Latva happened, and that was it."

"So we were all pretty much
raised by Grandpa."

"Grandpa taught us everything about
how to live in this world of snow."

"And then, not too long ago,
during a blizzard one night, Grandpa also..."
"People from Aelio helped with the search, but..."

"We couldn't even find any clues
as to where it happened."

"Ever since then, we've pretty much had to
provide our own means of living."

"The folks from Aelio suggested that
we should move to Central City."
"But we decided to carry on Grandpa's wishes."

"So we stayed here, and
that's what we've done."

"Although, we've never really been...
all that good at it, you know..."

"Everyone's been giving it
everything they've got, though."

"Individually, none of us have ever
been on the same page."

"We used to fight a lot about
what our course of action should be."

"Like, \"No, that won't work\",
and \"Here's why you're wrong\"."

"Without knowing what to do,
the only thing that progressed was time."

"Realizing that this wasn't working,
Ilma went off on his own."
"And then you three came along."

"I'm so glad we didn't just
keep on making mistakes like that."

"Thanks to you all, I think
we can proceed without any issues."
"That includes \"Lost Central\"..."

"As well as the powerful enemies
that we'll surely have to fight."

"If anything happens,
let us know right away."
"It's our turn to help you now."
"I mean... I'm not that strong by myself, but..."

"With all five of us,
we won't be losing to anyone."
"Let me promise you once more."

"In front of both Grandpa,
and my Mom and Dad."

"We'll support your battle
with all our strength."
"You can count on us."
